System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2[[System.UInt32, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[SolidCP.Providers.OS.FileHash, SolidCP.Providers.Base, Version=1.4.9.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=da8782a6fc4d0081]]

System.Data.DataSet.description: Represents an in-memory cache of data.

CaseSensitive.description: Indicates whether comparing strings within the DataSet is case sensitive.

DefaultViewManager.description: Indicates a custom "view" of the data contained by the DataSet. This view allows filtering, searching, and navigating through the custom data view.

EnforceConstraints.description: Indicates whether constraint rules are to be followed.

Namespace.description: Indicates the XML uri namespace for the root element pointed at by this DataSet.

Prefix.description: Indicates the prefix of the namespace used for this DataSet.

ExtendedProperties.description: The collection that holds custom user information.

HasErrors.description: Indicates that the DataSet has errors.

Relations.description: The collection that holds the relations for this DataSet.

Tables.description: The collection that holds the tables for this DataSet.
